description.narrative: Gender-sensitive community initiatives that promote inclusiveness and social cohesion established in select districts., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, more adolescents (age 10-18) access positive development opportunities, which enhance social cohesion in their communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Gender-sensitive community initiatives that promote inclusiveness and social cohesion established in select districts.

description.narrative: Increased service-access for vulnerable groups of young people, including girls, IDPs, refugees and unemployed youth was promoted and extended to 13 new districts and 13 new safe spaces across Iraq. 2,918 civic, social and economic initiatives with different aims and through different platforms were undertaken by UNICEF-supported adolescents and youth. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/12/2018
